changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS app_users ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL, user_name VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL, password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, role VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, account_enabled BOOLEAN, account_not_expired BOOLEAN, account_not_locked BOOLEAN, credentials_not_expired BOOLEAN, register_code VARCHAR(255), name VARCHAR(255), surname VARCHAR(255), phone_number VARCHAR(255), reset_password_code VARCHAR(255), reset_password_code_expiration TIMESTAMP );
